modules.description: Provides functions for compiling, matching, and extracting data from regular expressions using PCRE2. Works with strings, compiled patterns, and capture groups. Used to implement pattern matching in the Haxe compiler's code generation and analysis phases.

The module offers functions for compiling, matching, and manipulating Perl-compatible regular expressions, encompassing tasks like substring extraction, substitution, and text splitting. It operates on strings, compiled regex patterns, and match results, supporting advanced features such as named subpatterns, DFA matching, and callouts. Use cases include text parsing, data validation, and complex string transformations requiring precise control over pattern matching and replacement.
